China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 3 月 1 日星期五 08:00:44 GMT 120
Tesla rolls out new incentives in China as price war escalatesTesla unveiled new incentives, including insurance subsidies, on Friday to woo consumers in the world's largest auto market, where the U.S. electric vehicle giant is in a protracted price war against entrenched rivals such as BYD. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 04:38:20 GMT MPIE4DU3ZFPWVH2IIORYBARXSU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-rolls-out-new-incentives-china-price-war-escalates-2024-03-01/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Evergrande chairman's second seized Hong Kong mansion put up for saleA second mansion in Hong Kong that once belonged to China Evergrande Group's chairman has been put up for sale by its receivers, according to property agent Savills. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 03:43:54 GMT VKOITAMVPVOMVCHGZISCM3US7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ever-greatest-chairman-second-seized-hong-kong-mansion-put-up-sale-2024-03-01/Reuters世界中国
Asia's factories struggle for growth as Japan falters, China unsteadyAsia's major manufacturing economies struggled to claw their way out of decline in February with Japan particularly squeezed by a steeper fall in demand while an uneven recovery in China overshadowed some signs of improvement elsewhere in the region. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 03:10:50 GMT HMOHHJUTENOPPHEVVBNXKSJPSE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/wrapup-asian-factories-struggle-growth-japan-falters-china-unsteady-2024-03-01/Reuters市场宏观问题
Taiwan faces steady 'drip' of pressure as China tightens pre-inauguration squeezeTaiwan is facing a steady "drip, drip" of Chinese pressure ahead of the inauguration of its next president in May, with officials in Taipei fearing Beijing could further squeeze the island's room to manoeuvre without resorting to direct conflict. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 02:59:36 GMT 6KX3SDFKLJOTHFQG4QQ6H7TWYU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-faces-steady-drip-Pressure-china-tightens-pre-inauguration-squeeze-2024-03-01/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
Nikkei hits record high on Wall Street bounce, other Asian markets subduedJapan's Nikkei hit a fresh record high on Friday, buoyed by the bounce on Wall Street as a key U.S. inflation reading was in line with expectations, while markets elsewhere in Asia were more subdued on China's still-uncertain economic outlook. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 02:17:55 GMT QF76XCJ77RO55EZQF5JX6RVBJ4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-03-01/Stella Qiu市场
China's factory activity shrinks for 5th month, raises pressure for more stimulusChina's manufacturing activity in February shrank for a fifth straight month, an official survey showed on Friday, raising pressure on Beijing to roll out more stimulus measures as the parliament prepares for a key annual meeting next week. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 01:50:26 GMT 2HJFYPWTRJKY5MXV77I5WFVT3M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-feb-factory-activity-shrinks-5th-month-adding-Pressure-economy-2024-03-01/Ellen Zhang, Joe Cash世界中国
Dollar steady as traders weigh Fed rate cut bets; yen shaky at 150/dlrThe dollar was steady on Friday after data showed U.S. inflation remained sticky but is easing gradually, keeping hopes alive that the Federal Reserve will start cutting interest rates in June, while the yen stumbled back to the key 150 per dollar level. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 01:35:35 GMT 3QZR2YOKKBPAZBT2UPEG5UNZHI https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-steady-traders-weigh-fed-rate-cut-bets-yen-shaky-150dlr-2024-03-01/Ankur Banerjee市场货币
Australia's Syrah Resources inks offtake deal with S. Korea's Posco Future MAustralia's Syrah Resources said on Friday it will supply natural graphite product from its Balama graphite operations in Mozambique to South Korean chemical and battery material maker Posco Future M . China home prices likely to fall 0.9% this year; previous poll tipped growth: Reuters pollNew home prices in China are likely to fall this year due to limited effect of ongoing government support measures, a Reuters poll showed, with economists predicting the ailing market will need more than a year to bottom out. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 21:04:48 GMT Z2TRVAVA5BLHHA3ZEVCCCCBQI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-home-prices-likely-to-fall-09-this-year-previous-poll-tipped-growth-2024-02-29/Liangping Gao, Ryan Woo世界中国
Russian man who smuggled military technology to Russia pleads guilty in US courtA Russian man pled guilty on Thursday to U.S. charges that he smuggled large quantities of American-made, military-grade microelectronics to Russia, top U.S. justice officials said in a statement.
